description: Providing technical expertise and international best expertise to support and implementation of  a regulatory based integrated management system KIEM

subproject.description:
1. Technical expertise and international best practices provided to support the development and implementation of a regulatory based integrated management system (KIEM)
2. Strategic action plan with objectives, targets and performance indicators developed.
3. Regulatory air emissions inventory enhanced.
4. Discharge and monitoring permit system for marine sources established.
5. Integrated chemical management system enhanced and Integrated Environment Management System developed
subproject.title: KIEM-Kuwait Integrated Environ

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development

title: KIEM-Kuwait Integrated Environmental Management
